title: How to Search
body:
How to Search¶

Note

Searching is a helpful feature when there are many records and you wish to find a specific result, or many results that contain a common aspect (eg. all results from a certain project).

You should navigate to the page that contains the records through which you wish to search using the <i class=”fa fa-bars”></i> menu icon in the ribbon.

If you wish to apply more than one search criteria, you should consider using a filter.

  1. Click light red bar with <i class=”fa fa-search”></i> search icon entitled Search

  2. Type and wait for results to appear

  3. Click <i class=”fa fa-times-circle”></i> X icon to delete search and return to all records

  4. Searching all of the Maha Platform: * Click <i class=”fa fa-search”></i> search icon in the ribbon on the left hand side of the screen * Click Find Anything and type what you want to find * Click on the result to view
